column4: On my Hoary system I'm find both Apache and Apache2 installed.
well, someone else installed the apache2 package
ok the other user did it. I'm trying to get php4 installed.
when I installed apache under synaptic it brought in the some of the apache2 as dependences.
if I uninstall apache using synaptic, I assume it's going to do the reverse. right?
perhaps you meant to install libapache2-mod-php4?
I see the selection for libapache2-mod-php4,is this the only selection I have to make?
so, why don't you see what's answering you then?
the reply from netstat -plnt | grep 80 showed nothing listening. So why did the page pop-up/
perhaps your browser is crap and caching it
